channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Curried lentil, tomato and coconut soup
item.description:
Curried lentil, tomato and coconut soup



Coriander stalks can all too often be thrown away but they shouldn't be: they have the texture of chives and taste, unsurprisingly, of coriander. Serve with lime wedges, if you like, for a citrusy kick..

item.title: Broccoli cheese soup
item.description:
Broccoli cheese soup



In the world of cheaty foods, broccoli cheese soup has always seemed like one of the cheatiest. There's nothing wrong with owning it: Cheese is delicious, and not every single lunch has to be virtuous. Still, I sometimes wish that the broccoli part of the whole thing was taken a little more seriously, if only for the purely selfish reason that I love broccoli. My goal here was to create a recipe for broccoli cheese soup that was as comforting as the ultra-cheesy kind you typically find, but simultaneously really tasted like broccoli..

item.title: Curried mushroom flatbreads
item.description:
Curried mushroom flatbreads



Top naan breads with curried portobello mushrooms and Greek-style yogurt .

item.title: Jerk sweet potato & black bean curry
item.description:
Jerk sweet potato & black bean curry



Serve your vegetable curry Caribbean style, flavoured with thyme, jerk seasoning and red peppers - great with rice and peas..

item.title: Mediterranean fish roast
item.description:
Mediterranean fish roast



Roasting vegetables like courgettes and tomatoes concentrates their flavours and turns them into fantastic partners for fillets of fish..
